ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_1: If you want to travel somewhere around the world but you can’t find anyone to go with you, we have a solution.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_2: Our goal is to help people in this situation by finding the best partner to travel together, so you can have a wonderful experience.

CONTACTS.ALERT_MESSAGE_MESSAGE: Are you sure of removing this user? Remember to rate him to preserve Travelmate's community safety

GDPR.TEXT_10: . The photos you add will be stored in
GDPR.TEXT_10B: . All the data will de showed to others users for them to join.
GDPR.TEXT_11: What happens when you are premium?
GDPR.TEXT_12: In this case we will only and exclusively store if a payment has been made and the date. The rest of the information such as card number and passwords to access payment accounts, will be stored by Paypal, a third party to whom you send your data from your browser. If you need more information, you can read Paypal's privacy policy
GDPR.TEXT_15: What happens when you interact with another user?
GDPR.TEXT_16: Travelmate will store any interaction you make with other users, contact requests and rejections you make to update your preferences and adapt the application to your wishes. The messages in the chat, will be stored too for later recoveries. That is wy we will store them in our servers and
GDPR.TEXT_17: What happens when you join a trip?
GDPR.TEXT_18: We will store that information on our servers and
GDPR.TEXT_18B: and it will be shown to the rest of the users as part of the trip information, that way they know that if they join the trip, they are traveling with you.
GDPR.TEXT_19: Can I browse the Travelmate aplication without transferring personal data?
GDPR.TEXT_2: Travelmate is a university project, without legal form. We hope it would be the seed of a future society, meanwhile you can find us at
GDPR.TEXT_20: Travelmate needs your personal data in order to offer you recommendations, which is the final meaning of our application, so it is impossible to navigate without giving them away.
GDPR.TEXT_21: If you no accept this question you can leave here:
GDPR.TEXT_22: How can you revoke or access your personal data?
GDPR.TEXT_23: At any time you can request the deletion of your personal data and we will do everything we could to respect your privacy.
GDPR.TEXT_25: A cookie is an information file that the Travelmate server sends to your device (computer, smartphone, tablet, etc.), to store information about the navigation from your device.
GDPR.TEXT_27: We use technical Cookies that are those that allow the user to navigate through the aplication and select the different options or services in it, such as choosing a language and identifying the session.
GDPR.TEXT_29: We will also use Marketing Cookies managed by third parties. These cookies are used to pass information about your visit and thus adapt the displayed ads and assign commissions for referred sales.
GDPR.TEXT_3: What do we do with your personal data?
GDPR.TEXT_30: How can I control the use of cookies?
GDPR.TEXT_31: The user can - at any time - choose which cookies he wants to work on this website through the browser settings; for example:
GDPR.TEXT_35: According to the regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and the Council of April 27, 2016, regarding the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data, the consent on the part of the user must be absolutely clear. If this is the first time you visit us (or you have deleted our cookies) a pop-up window will be displayed so that you accept our privacy policy in such a way that if you ignore the message and continue browsing you will be accepting our privacy policy..
GDPR.TEXT_37: A data breach is any occasion where security measures have been deliberately or accidentally circumvented in order to access, alter, disclose or destroy personal information.
GDPR.TEXT_38: For example, if unauthorised parties have gained access to and potentially obtained copies of your personal information from our systems.
GDPR.TEXT_39: In the unlikely event that there is a personal data breach that represents a risk to individuals or their businesses,
GDPR.TEXT_40: we will inform the Information Commissioners Office (ICO) within 72 hours of becoming aware of it.
GDPR.TEXT_4: In Travelmate we do not store personal data that we do not need to get our goal which is to facilitate users to travel together. We want you to know what happens when you enjoy our application, so we will show you the cases you give us personal data. That way you are aware and can exercise your rights.
GDPR.TEXT_5: What happens when you sing up?
GDPR.TEXT_6: In this case we are storing the data you provide in the form in our servers and in the Heroku’s server. These data are necessary to know who you are and show your information to other users. Heroku has secure servers that use encrypted connections for the transfer of data. Its privacy policy can be found
GDPR.TEXT_7: Your profile photo, that identify you to other users, will be stored on an Amazon web services servers whose privacy policy can be found
GDPR.TEXT_8: What happens when you create a trip?
GDPR.TEXT_9: We will keep all the data you provide us on our server and in
GDPR.TEXT_9B: to show them to other users.
GDPR.TITLE: General Data Protection Regulation
